external_references.description: Sygnia Team. (2024, July 1). China-Nexus Threat Group ‘Velvet Ant’ Exploits Cisco Zero-Day (CVE-2024-20399) to Compromise Nexus Switch Devices – Advisory for Mitigation and Response. Retrieved March 14, 2025.

objects.description: [Velvet Ant](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1047) exploited CVE-2024-20399 in Cisco Switches to which the threat actor was already able to authenticate in order to escape the NX-OS command line interface and gain access to the underlying operating system for arbitrary command execution.(Citation: Sygnia VelvetAnt 2024B)
